villager_13.question: What happens when a player attempts to trade with a baby villager in Minecraft?
villager_13.reference_answer: The villager displays a head-bobbling animation and plays the declined trade sound when a player tries to trade with a baby villager.
villager_13.model_answer: When a player attempts to trade with a baby villager in Minecraft, the villager displays a head-bobbing animation and plays the villager's declined trade sound.

block_3.question: Which block in the chunk allows you to hang items or maps in the game?
block_3.reference_answer: The Item Frame (as a block) allows you to hang items or maps in the game.

aquatic.question: Which enchantment deals extra damage to aquatic mobs in Minecraft?
aquatic.reference_answer: The Impaling enchantment deals extra damage to aquatic mobs.
aquatic.model_answer: The enchantment that deals extra damage to aquatic mobs in Minecraft is Impaling.

stray_2.question: What type of arrows do strays shoot when they are holding a tipped arrow or spectral arrow in their off-hand?
stray_2.reference_answer: Strays always shoot the type of arrow they are holding in their off-hand, and the arrow is not consumed.
stray_2.model_answer: According to the context, strays that are holding a tipped arrow or spectral arrow in their off-hand always shoot that type of arrow instead.

trophy_april_fools_joke.question: Which advancement in Minecraft requires eating 100 poisonous potatoes to obtain a trophy block?
trophy_april_fools_joke.reference_answer: The 'Certified Spud Chomper' advancement requires eating 100 poisonous potatoes to obtain the Mega Spud trophy block.
trophy_april_fools_joke.model_answer: I donâ€™t have enough information in the provided context to answer this question.

mine_travelling_block.question: What happens when a player clicks on a mine travelling block in Minecraft?
mine_travelling_block.reference_answer: When clicked, the mine travelling block displays a countdown in the action bar and teleports the player to the set dimension or back to the Hub.
mine_travelling_block.model_answer: When a player clicks on a mine travelling block in Minecraft, it sends the player in and out of a mine. The block displays an ever-growing countdown using the action bar before teleporting the player to the dimension set or back to the Hub.

ominous_trial_spawner_1.question: What happens to the mobs already spawned by a trial spawner when it converts into an ominous trial spawner?
ominous_trial_spawner_1.reference_answer: When a trial spawner becomes ominous, all of its existing mobs are despawned.
ominous_trial_spawner_1.model_answer: When a trial spawner converts into an ominous trial spawner, all of its existing mobs are despawned.

block_of_lapis_lazuli.question: What type of pickaxe is required to mine a block of lapis lazuli in Minecraft?
block_of_lapis_lazuli.reference_answer: A stone pickaxe or better is required to mine a block of lapis lazuli.
block_of_lapis_lazuli.model_answer: A block of lapis lazuli can be mined using a stone pickaxe or better.
